entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
